mapper.insert: INSERT INTO extract_question ( exam_org_code, exam_cate_code, exam_year, exam_month, subject_code, exam_type, extract_hub_code, question_no, question, question_sub, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5 ) VALUES ( #{examOrgCode}, #{examCateCode}, #{examYear}, #{examMonth}, #{subjectCode}, #{examType}, #{extractHubCode}, #{questionNo}, #{question}, #{questionSub}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option4}, #{option5} )
